Title: Adey MC2 central heating silencer 500ml (1)
Description: Helping to prevent boiler noise, the Adey MC2 500ml central heating silencer also eliminates limescale for better boiler efficiency as well as a quieter life. Suitable for use on all metals commonly found in a boiler, including aluminium, this environmentally-friendly solution can be used in any central heating system.
